description.value:
+20 to Pinning Tests made whilst benefitting from cover. Medals can't be acquired, only earned. Looks like a Gold Medallion inlaid with iron.

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Hold a Pass, Fortification, or Entrenchment against an Ork Horde of at least 100 for 24 hours or longer.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
